description: This file contains CSS variables and styles for managing themes in a React application, including styling for light and dark themes, as well as component styles for the main app, headers, and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application component styling with centered text and background color transitions.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo with specific height and pointer-event settings.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the main application with flexbox positioning.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the button that toggles themes between light and dark modes.
